For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239489. Service plan - 6 year/90 000KM ; Warranty - 6 year/150 000KM
The rugged redefined Nissan Navara was designed to show of its capabilities on the road. This Double Cab Bakkie is a definite stunner. This Navara is ready to conquer on and off the road. The Double Cab market in South Africa is one of the most competitive of all vehicle segments, merely because people are looking for a comfortable vehicle which can be used anywhere without compromise. 
Now manufactured in South Africa, the Navara is tailor made to conquer any terrain Mzansi has to offer.
